client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM has known Laurent Bonnet Richard since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
Laurent Bonnet Richard is a 42 year old Shipping Company Owner from France. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
client_description_Family_Background: Laurent Bonnet Richard and Flore have been married since 2012. Laurent and Flore have 2 children, named Bernard and Léa.
client_description_Education_Background:
Laurent graduated from Lycée La Martinière Monplaisir in 2000.
Laurent finished his studies at École Normale Supérieure (ENS) Paris in 2006.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Having worked for over 18 years, Laurent Bonnet Richard brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Laurent Bonnet Richard began his professional journey as a Ship Broker at CMA CGM S.A. in 2007, laying the foundation for future success.
His subsequent role was as a Shipping Company Owner at CMA CGM S.A., where he continued to grow professionally from 2012 till now.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 170000 EUR.
He owns villa in Le Havre, where he resides. It is worth 2790000 EUR.

He inherited a significant sum of 3900000 EUR from his father, a respected Private Equity Manager, in 2013, which he has wisely invested.
client_description_Client_Summary: In summary, Laurent has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
